title: Income Tax (Agence Francaise De Development and PROPARCO) (Approval and Exemption) Order, 2016
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 379
Gazette dated Friday, 13th May, 2016
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 30 OF 2016
The Income Tax Act
(Laws, Volume 19, Cap 323)
The Income Tax (Agence Francaise De Development
and PROPARCO) (Approval and Exemption)
Order, 2016
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section fifteen of the
Income Tax Act, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Income Tax (Agence Title
Francaise De Development and PROPARCO) (Approval and
Exemption) Order, 2016.
2. The Agence Francaise De Development and Approval of
PROPARCO are approved organisations for the purposes of international
organisations
exemption from tax with respect to the Agreement specified in the
Schedule.
3. The income earned, including interest, fees and commission, Exemption
by the organisations approved in paragraph 2 and accruing under from tax
the Agreement specified in the Schedule, is exempt from tax pursuant
to paragraph 5 (5) of Part III of the Second Schedule to the Act.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101, Lusaka, Price K4.00 each
380 Statutory Instruments 13th May, 2016
SCHEDULE
(Paragraph 2)
AGREEMENT
Agreement between the Government of the Republic of Zambia and the
Government of the French Republic with respect to the activities of Agence
Fran√ßaise De Development and PROPARCO in Zambia.
A. B. CHIKWANDA,
LUSAKA Minister of Finance
9th May, 2016
[MF/IDM.6/16/38]
